messages.text: "Call me when you can "
"Draft statement that we will push as soon as you approve: "

"‚ÄúCongratulations to Dan Ryan, who will be serving out the remaining term of our friend and colleague, Commissioner Nick Fish. Dan has big shoes to fill, but I look forward to him joining this Council and I know he will serve Portlanders well. Together, we can build on the progress we have made to address homelessness and mental health, chart an aggressive course for pandemic recovery, and continue reforms to make Portland a more just and equitable city.‚Äù"
"Good"
"Ok with just pushing out on social media?"
"Yes "
"I congratulated him from the Dias this am. I heard it on the radio. "
"We are planning on making employment offer to Asena today. Please call or text me this morning if you want to discuss beforehand. "
"Go for it "
"4pm call work for you?"
"With Lovell and Davis "
"Yes. 4pm. "
"Sorry was out for a walk. "
"Liked ‚ÄúSorry was out for a walk. ‚Äù"
"Please call Randy Miller re charter commission "
"Ok. "

"I agree that private sector should help with downtown reactivating funding, but also directed my staff to find dollars in Spectator/Visitor activities fund to help. It is an appropriate use of funds "
"Agreed"
"Thanks again for participating in CPC, we really appreciate it."
"You Did a great job. Thank you."
"Please add the following appointment to my calendar.REDACTED. October 13, 2020 at 12:30 PM"
"Liked ‚ÄúPlease add the following appointment to my calendar.REDACTED. October 13, 2020 at 12:30 PM‚Äù"
"Got it"
"Mayor- do you want to meet Helen Jung in person or over the phone/ zoom "
"Either her preference "
"Please remember to add my REDACTED at 12:30 on October 13. I absolutely cannot miss that appointment."
"I thought I did. Will do "
"Also "
"Just sent you Sonia's official offer letter. Ok to put your e signature on it? "
"Yes approved. "
"üëçüèΩ "
"üëçüèΩ "
"The REDACTED is there. Gave you plenty of time"
"Thx"
"Of course! "
"Mayor- scheduling a 9am with the Chief and Tracy Reeve to discuss REDACTED Link coming shortly after I get confirmation from everyone. "
"Confirmed for 9am "
"Ok. I also need to know REDACTED. "
"Liked ‚ÄúOk. I also need to know REDACTED. ‚Äù"
"I'll let them know. "
"My city parking permit has expired. I'll need another sticker for the year 2021."
"Those should have came weeks ago! I will follow up"
"Thank you. "
"Are you working today?"
"Yes! "
"Or on furlough "
"I'm here "
"How can I help :) "
"Ok thanks. I need you here at the condo 12:30-1:30. Need help w something. "
"May not need the help but need you on standby just in case. "
"Ok"
"I'll keep you posted. "
"Sounds good. "
"Can you also pls coordinate my schedule with Katrina on August 21. Thx. (She has all the details.)"
"Sure "
"Don't need you at 12:30. Problem fixed. "
"üëçüèΩ "
"FYI - you're meeting Patrick Kimmons mother in your office at City Hall"
"Yes. Who is staffing. "
"Just Robert "
"Ok"
"I asked PBOT to resend parking permits - they sent when I was on vacation and no one knows where they are "
"Should have for you by Monday or Tuesday "
"Ok"
"Sorry for in the inconvenience "
"No prob. "
"üëçüèΩ"
"Are you at City Hall? I forgot my key card I'll be there in about five minutes."
"No- I will alert security"
"Adrian is aware and will let you in "
"Thx"
"Can I swing by to drop off your parking pass? "
"Yes"
"I'm downstairs "
"Saw Q downstairs and gave to her "
"Thank you!!"
"Of course"
"Mayor- are you okay if I set some time in the middle of the day tomorrow with your Chief and the new Comms consultant,Ariane, tomorrow between CA time? "

"Make it 12:30. I have to take Q to the beach to drop her off at her moms. Then I'll do call time from my car and I need time to drive most of the way back from the beach before I will get cell reception."

"Liked ‚ÄúMake it 12:30. I have to take Q to the beach to drop her off at her moms. Then I'll do call time from my car and I need time to drive most of the way back from the beach before I will get cell reception.‚Äù"
"Yes sir"
"Tomorrow at the youth conservation celebration - would you want to do a Q&A from the youth? "
"Sure"
"Ok "
"And still setting to get a hold of commissioner elect Ryan. No response yet "
"since I cannot get a hold of Commissioner-elect Ryan I will take off your calendar and keep trying "
"Thx"
"Please add a REDACTED to my calendar for next Thursday, August 20 at 6 PM."
"Liked ‚ÄúPlease add a REDACTED to my calendar for next Thursday, August 20 at 6 PM.‚Äù"
"Got it"
"Aja am I expected on home for everyone tomorrow. Can't tell. Thx "
"On home? "
"Sorry. Home for everyone at 11"
"Oooooops. Economic impact committee. "
"Yes, this is the last one "
"According to prosper "
"Sending info to you from staff now "
"Ok. Thx. "
"I cannot log into the Home for everyone executive committee meeting I need either the proper email address or a different panelist password"
"Did you input      ted.wheeler@portlandoregon.gov      Password: REDACTED"
"Good lord. Now I'm downloading some app"
"Yeah... "
"Yes. "
"I wish they would have just used zoom "
"I let them know for the future "
"I'm in. "
"Ok"
"Please schedule Chloe one on one call to pow afternoon. Also schedule a meeting with Sharon Mieren later this week. "
"Tomorrow? For Chloe ? "
"Yes"
"Ok "
"Do you have a Timber's Jersey that you can wear for the proclamation tomorrow? Otherwise we have a timbers scarf for you"
"I have a t shirt. "
"Liked an image"
"Perfect "

"Mayor, sharing a tweet draft for review. Already has edits from myself and Nicole.      'July brought increased gun violence to Portland - the worst our community has seen in at least 30 years. ‚ÄãFamilies have experienced unimaginable loss, as others continue to live in fear. As your Mayor, I'm concerned for the health, safety and welfare of everyone in our community. ‚ÄãAs your Police Commissioner, I am committed to working with PPB, city partners, and the community to craft a community-based solution that will save lives. The Police Bureau, the Office of Violence Prevention, and most importantly our community must come together now to address this terrible, unacceptable threat to life, safety, and peace in our city. '    "
"Excellent approved "
"üôè"

"Mayor... I just hit up your email with background for tomorrow's digital joint press conference. It's announcing the deployment of $35 million for rental assistance to COVID-19 impacted homes. Please let me know if you have any questions at this juncture. Brief TPs will be ready by the end of day today."
"Ok thx"
"Afternoon... for our 3 pm off the record with Helen Jung, I'll call you first and then three-way her in. "
"Ok"
"Thank you for arranging that. Time well spent. "
"Sure thing. More similar conversations with other media leaders would be great."
"Some tough but fair questions. You met them head on and I thought did great. Did you want to debrief at all? "

"Tweet for approval:      Nearly 23 years ago, Fair Wayne Bryant, a Black man, was sentenced to life in prison for attempting to steal hedge clippers. The Louisiana Supreme Court refuses to review his sentence.        Too often, across this nation, Black people are, and have been, harshly and disproportionately punished for non-violent crimes. This is another case of blatant racism in the criminal justice system. I call on lawmakers to demand #justice for Bryant "
"Yes"
"Thx. Gonna tweet about blazers and timbers tonight too  ( if timbers win also)."
"For?"
"We're just putting it on the agenda in this vote, not debating it "
"Could I please get Nathan Sasaki‚Äôs email address thx. "
REDACTED
"Thx"
"Can I pls get clarity on what the 8:30 am meeting is pls. "

"Good morning- Ezra Hammer sets these up once a month- Connect with HBA PDX membership to share your perspective on your priorities:   - Police reform   - COVID-19 relief measures   - City Budget   - Legislative land use items   "
"Thx. So no tps required right?"
"The talking points are the ones you used for your press conference last week. Sam is that correct? "
"Liked ‚ÄúThx. So no tps required right?‚Äù"
"Liked ‚ÄúThe talking points are the ones you used for your press conference last week. Sam is that correct? ‚Äù"
"That's right. "
"Thank you! Ezra and I texted - I'll get back to him about the vehicle towing by end of this week. "

"Mayor- reminder about the 1pm:       This is a chance to speak to your security detail about the night you went to the protest and to say thank you and give any feedback as needed. Short 15-20min max. "
"Thx"
"Able to join? "
"Confirmed yesterday for the call with Joe. Just messaged his assistant to find out what's up. "
"Verizon Msg: Your int'l data costs up to $2.05 per MB. To purchase a monthly plan, the account owner must contact Customer Service."
"Pls tweet about the blazers tonight thx "
"Okay."

"This is crap journalism. I never asserted that the elimination of GVRT CAUSED an increase in gun violence. WTF are they teaching at journalism school these days. https://www.wweek.com/news/city/2020/08/07/commissioner-jo-ann-hardesty-disputes-mayors-assertion-that-disbanding-the-gun-violence-reduction-team-caused-a-spike-in-shootings/"
"Please get me an off the record meeting with her next week. "
"üëåüèª "
"Please call thx. "
"Just an update, have we closed the listing for COM's director? What are we intending to pay?"
"Closed on Monday. Range is $73-$110, subject to HR equal pay calculation. "
"Thx. "
"With Eudaly when you're ready "
"Logging on now"
"Really well done, Mayor. "
"Will and doubted Lee take some shit for it. But it had to be said, all of it."
"Commissioner Hardesty just asked me if Zach is leaving. If so she wants to know who is taking over homeless issues while Seraphie is on vacation?"
"He is temporary and contract expires end of August but we may extend. We will make sure they know who the point of contact is. "
"Thx. Pls cc the commissioner directly so that she knows we responded. "
"üëçüèº"
"This is from a constituent. Let's see what we've got by way of a plan to clean up the city. Can I get a briefing today or tomorrow? Thx. "

"'I know you have more than a ton of stuff on your plate of more importance then the cleanliness of our city but cleaning it would at least allow our citizens to have pride in its beauty.¬†¬†¬†This is waterfront park and it hasn‚Äôt been maintained.¬†¬†None of the trash cans have lids. Yesterday I took the taylor street entrance to the freeway and it was lined with garbage.¬†¬†We need to keep our city clean.¬†¬†What can we do?'"
"Great timing. Your follow-up briefing with Tom, Marc, and Shannon is at the end of the day today. Should be a good discussion. "
"Great thx. "
"Liked ‚ÄúGreat timing. Your follow-up briefing with Tom, Marc, and Shannon is at the end of the day today. Should be a good discussion. ‚Äù"
"Commissioner Fritz would like a meeting with me and the police chief and possibly Captain Dobson. She would like to offer suggestions. "
"Okay. I will follow up. "
"Aja I spoke with Helen Jung This weekend about scheduling some off the record time with her. Please schedule."
"Liked ‚ÄúAja I spoke with Helen Jung This weekend about scheduling some off the record time with her. Please schedule.‚Äù"
"On it"
"üëç "
"Call w/ Fritz and Chief Lovell Scheduled for today at 11:30am.      503-823-9789      No password needed"
"Thx"
"Commissioner Hardesty would like a similar briefing with Chief Lovell and Captain Dobson that we had with Commissioner Fritz. I would be happy to participate in that as well."
"You have a check- in with her tomorrow can we just add the Chief then? "
"I don't see a problem with that. Could you check with her staff?"
"On it"
"Confirmed for tomorrow at 11:30"
"Thank you!"
"FYI from Nik. I told Chief and Robert."
"Ok"
"Ok- I'll wait to hear from her scheduler"
"This has been scheduled for 2:30 today"

"I just heard a good story on KXL that accurately reflected what happened. Maybe what we need is a intervention with the Oregonian to help them better understand the context. Maybe the chief and I should meet with them."
"I suggested that a while back and it didn't come together but I still think a visit to the ed board, where reporters would sit in, is a good idea. "

"Robert I think we should let Nike know that we actively embrace these efforts around addressing gun violence. I don't think we should be put in a position where it looks like people are telling us to pay attention to this issue. We're all over it."
"Yes I agree Antionette is creating the run of show for the presser and I will suggest Nike an on the list "
"Yes I agree Antionette is creating the run of show for the presser and I will suggest Nike an on the list "
"Thx"

"Chuck just a heads up on the call we're about to take with Commissioner Fritz. She was concerned by some of the recent tactics of the PPB and wanted to give us her perspective on how things could improve."
"Ok"
"Mayor, talking points in your inbox for review. "
"Actually, I'm sorry. Hold. Updated version coming in two minutes. "

"I would add:      This was not a peaceful demonstration, nor was it intended to be. It was a planned attack. (Do I have the flyer?)      Also add:      We expect there to be more of these types of planned actions in the coming days. If you are a non-violent demonstrator you do not want to be part of this, and we are asking you to stay away from impacted areas.       I have authorized the police bureau to do what they need to do to arrest and hold responsible those who are engaged in this kind of dangerous criminal activity. It will not be tolerated."
"CS gas was authorized by all agencies involved. No Sigues gas was deployed until after the arson."
"The intent was to cause serious injury or death."
"Will do. Thanks. "
"I would also add that I will be coming back with more details on our plan to address heightened gun violence throughout the city early next week."
"Yep. Back in your inbox shortly. "
"Robert please email the three of us the flyer. "
"Similarly I added a bullet point. 'last night police officers in a police precinct were violently attacked and I will not tolerate this threat to their safety and I stand against this violence'."
"We need one person managing the doc. Please send input to me. Multiple versions is confusing and only ever ends badly. "
"We need one person managing the doc. Please send input to me. Multiple versions is confusing and only ever ends badly. "
"OK I replied back with my suggested edits  and will let you edit the final doc"
"Final in your inbox, Mayor. "

"I will obviously not have the flyer with me so I cannot display it. Perhaps Chief Leval could? Also I would strongly encourage the chief to read the action report as it was drafted last night. It's quite a narrative."
"Lovell "
"Tim, please facilitate. Thanks. "
"Will do,"
"It's at 1:30 right?"
"Yes"
"Please jump in ahead of time though.. when you can."

"No comment ?      Hi Tim, this is Jayati at The Oregonian. I am reaching out to see if Mayor Wheeler has a comment on the comments Donald Trump made this afternoon about him and Portland. Specifically his comment that 'Wheeler has abdicated his duty and surrendered his city to the mob.'   Feel free to call me. Thanks"
"No comment. "
"Definitely not worth responding to. I can't believe that's what the President of the United States is spending his time on."
"I know. Unbelievable. Will do. Thanx."
"Anarchists are attacking the front of East precinct "
"Good work chief. I don't have captain pass it or his phone so could you pass on my thanks to him please? Robert can you also thank the lieutenant from the fire bureau for me. He was very good"
"Thanks.   Will do boss."
"Will do boss thank you very much you did great, grateful for you,  appreciate everything everybody did today"
"Well now we have to deliver on our plan to reduce gun violence."
"I have every confidence that I'll have a comprehensive strategy in hand by Monday. It could include additional asks of the budget or the council."

"Yes Boss by Monday.        Working with Aja to have you attend the CPC tomorrow.        You will be on the call and listen then have closing remarks based on what you hear.        It will be about emotionally reflecting on the testimony of those traumatized who will share on the call and point folks to the commitment and the work going forward "
" Chief you going to CPC tomorrow "
"Commissioner Hardesty wants to be directly on the list of people to receive the daily updates. Not just to her staff but her directly. Thank you."
"Copy "
"I will attending CPC but may have to jump off for a bit.  Contractor coming in the morning.   "
"Ok thx "
"Mayor I just sent today's demonstration summary directly to the commissioner per your direction. Robert"
"Thank you. "

"It's disappointing to me that we are now having debates about whether intentionally set fires are big enough to be concerned about or not. this despite the fact that people are intentionally locked into the building where the fires are being set. What a sad state of affairs we find ourselves in:      https://www.oregonlive.com/portland/2020/08/portland-officials-warn-non-violent-demonstrators-to-avoid-protests-that-veer-toward-destruction.html"
"Went to visit our RRT officers tonight.  They are tired and frustrated.  "
"Can't blame them. "
"They're holding together, but not sure for how much longer "
"Unlawful assembly sound truck messaging leave to the north "
"Do we have OSP with us tonight?"
"I believe my meeting is with the governor tomorrow. If there's something else we need I can ask."
"I thought I recall from the superintendent today that he would have his folks there to assist tonight"
"Sounds good. "
"I'll check with the chief to see what if any other requests the house for your meeting with the governor"
"The little fire in a garbage can in front of the precinct soundtracks continuing to give messages to leave but the groups not moving or responding in anyway"
"We have MRT with RRT"
"Hopefully the fire and the can will burn itself out."
"Ok thx chief. "
"Good work today by the way. "
"Thanks"
"Looks like the fires mostly under control"
"They're dispersing the crowd continuing to message unlawful assembly moving East "
"They're continuing to disperse from the area moving east"
"Looks like a couple of arrests no cs gas use no of smoke"
"Someone in the crowd flat in the tire of the soundtrack by putting on spike strips"
"Ridiculous. "
"500-1000 people Leaving peninsular Park on the move in there either going to the union office or they're going to North precinct"
"Thousand people chanting all cops are bastards"
"This is a moment for tremendous restraint. Obviously."
"Yes looks like they are  heading to Denver and then probably down to Lombard to the union office ....there's a lot of people"
"Crazy times. "
"They arrived at the union office sound truck is giving admonition some "
"Ok"

"At some point tomorrow or Monday we should also have the police bro issue a brief statement explaining why no charges were filed against the fellow who drove through the protest with the motorcycle under his truck. I'm still getting emails about this. It made good sense why he was not charged please send some public information out."
"Will do "
"Copy that."

"Tom, Commissioner Hardesty and I have now read your memo. Could we please schedule a call later this week with the commissioner and me to go over some questions? Sonia could you arrange that please and coordinate with Commissioner Hardesty."
"I've already asked Aja to schedule for Monday/Tuesday. Can expedite if needed. "
"I'm sure that's fine. "
"I will make time whenever is convenient for both of you. Looking forward to the conversation."
"üëçüèº "
"üëçüèΩ"
"I will also use some of my furlough Friday time if it helps before noon "
"Can we confirm 10am tomorrow?"
"Aja will follow up with Lyne. "
"Liked ‚ÄúAja will follow up with Lyne. ‚Äù"

"As much as it will probably turn into a bloodbath, I think you need to get me in front of the media today. We need a time/place/manner restriction around police facilities.  We need to tell people to stay away. In exchange the police need to agree to stay out of sight unless something happens. We need to focus our resources on Gun violence. We are running out of options. "
"I'll follow up on this. I recommend meeting with police bureau, city attorney, OSP this morning. "
"Good. "
"FYI. "
"Thanks.  I'll call him today "

"I want to be clear despite what is in Willamette Week I never asserted that the elimination of the gun violence reduction team had any impact whatsoever on gun violence in Portland. I think you know that, I just want to make sure you understand my position on this. They are drawing a conclusion that I definitely did not make."
"And to be fair to the author, she used the word 'hinted at' as the basis for her comment."
"The headline of course, is just flat out false. I never made any 'assertion' as is stated."
"I watched the press conference "

"I want to be clear I'm not upset with you in anyway. I believe the reporter was trying to draw causality, whereas I was not. My point was that there were some aspects of GVR teeth that were valuable, there are other aspects that have to be changed including the community component. I'm just irritated that she drew causality based on what even she described as 'a hint,' then used it as a wedge to divide us. I'm tired of the local media trying to drum up conflict when frankly there really isn't. That's all, I'm over it now."

"I had the same conversation with Chief Lovell .  I told him there was no reason he couldn't have a internal team addressing shootings within the detectives division.  He didn't even know domestic violence is up 187%.  I hope he makes it as Chief but I'm not hopeful "
"I look forward to working with you on this. Mommies work today - enjoy your vacation!"
"You too "
"Mayor- are you available for a very short video shoot w/ Adam for Smart Cities Policy Group for a message from a number of mayors about Covid-19 at noon? "
"Mayor- are you available for a very short video shoot w/ Adam for Smart Cities Policy Group for a message from a number of mayors about Covid-19 at noon? "
"Never mind we will do later this week "
"Thank you. I'm back now and able to communicate."
"Liked ‚ÄúThank you. I'm back now and able to communicate.‚Äù"
"No worries- we are postponing "
"Can we move the video shoot back 30 minutes. Q is still in her orthodontist appointment."
"Yes sir"
"Thx"
"Adam I'll wait for you downstairs. "

"I would expect that you would all watch today's press conference with Seattle Mayor Durkan. It is available online. She has broken with her council. Her last answer was extremely similar to my own views. "
"No talking points. Nobody on the call. "
"Sent TPs . Having trouble getting in call"
"Their doing a good job holding the line at North"
"Good thx. "
"Kristen I don't know if you're watching any of this it's on lifestream woke.net       It'll be peaceful for maybe another hour or so and then it'll devolve"
"Hopefully not. "
"They're clearing the street we're making some arrests"
REDACTED
REDACTED
REDACTED
REDACTED
REDACTED
REDACTED
REDACTED
REDACTED
REDACTED
REDACTED
REDACTED
REDACTED
"109699   Use this code for Microsoft verification"
"329633   Use this code for Microsoft verification"

"Mayor-    Just resent your talking points and memo for the  Youth Conservation parks event this afternoon.       Everett and security will meet you there.       Location is: Roseway Parkway (NE 72nd & NE Mason st)      Everett is on this text if you have questions. "
"And I'll have a hard copy of your prep memo as well.      Program is lunch, presentations from youth, your remarks, and a Q&A with you."

"We are going to spend a considerable amount of time today answering questions about this. We should be prepared. Commissioners Hardesty and Eudaly are demanding answers. This seems like a significant change in tactics on the part of PPB. Obviously, it didn't work.         https://www.oregonlive.com/portland/2020/08/portland-protests-against-police-violence-racism-continue-on-79th-night-friday.html   "
"SERT and crisis negotiations team Are still in Washington Park attempting to negotiate the suspect armed with knives into custody. I'll forward the press release"
"Thank you "
